1: חֲז֖וֹן <sup>2377 </sup> <n>The vision</n> עֹֽבַדְיָ֑ה <sup>5662 </sup> <n>of Obadiah</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֨י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from the LORD</n> לֶאֱד֗וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>concerning Edom</n> שְׁמוּעָ֨ה <sup>8052 </sup> <n>a rumour</n> שָׁמַ֜עְנוּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>We have heard</n> מֵאֵ֤ת <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> וְצִיר֙ <sup>6735 </sup> <n>and an ambassador</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n> שֻׁלָּ֔ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>is sent</n> ק֛וּמוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> וְנָק֥וּמָה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>ye and let us rise up</n> עָלֶ֖יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>against her in battle</n>
2: הִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> קָטֹ֛ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>thee small</n> נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Behold I have made</n> בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n> בָּז֥וּי <sup>959 </sup> <n>despised</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>thou art greatly</n>
3: זְד֤וֹן <sup>2087 </sup> <n>The pride</n> לִבְּךָ֙ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>of thine heart</n> הִשִּׁיאֶ֔ךָ <sup>5377 </sup> <n>hath deceived</n> שֹׁכְנִ֥י <sup>7931 </sup> <n>thee thou that dwellest</n> בְחַגְוֵי־ <sup>2288 </sup> <n>in the clefts</n> סֶּ֖לַע <sup>5553 </sup> <n>of the rock</n> מְר֣וֹם <sup>4791 </sup> <n>[is] high</n> שִׁבְתּ֑וֹ <sup>7674 </sup> <n>cease</n> אֹמֵ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that saith</n> בְּלִבּ֔וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in his heart</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יוֹרִדֵ֖נִי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>Who shall bring me down</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>common</n>
4: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> תַּגְבִּ֣יהַּ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>Though thou exalt</n> כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁר <sup>5404 </sup> <n>[thyself] as the eagle</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>among</n> כּֽוֹכָבִ֖ים <sup>3556 </sup> <n>among the stars</n> שִׂ֣ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and though thou set</n> קִנֶּ֑ךָ <sup>7064 </sup> <n>thy nest</n> מִשָּׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אוֹרִֽידְךָ֖ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>thence will I bring thee down</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
5: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> גַּנָּבִ֤ים <sup>1590 </sup> <n>If thieves</n> בָּאֽוּ־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> לְךָ֙ אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> שׁ֣וֹדְדֵי <sup>7703 </sup> <n>to thee if robbers</n> לַ֔יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>by night</n> אֵ֣יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> נִדְמֵ֔יתָה <sup>1820 </sup> <n>(how art thou cut off</n> הֲל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִגְנְב֖וּ <sup>1589 </sup> <n>) would they not have stolen</n> דַּיָּ֑ם <sup>1767 </sup> <n>had</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> בֹּֽצְרִים֙ <sup>1219 </sup> <n>gatherers</n> בָּ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> לָ֔ךְ הֲל֖וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יַשְׁאִ֥ירוּ <sup>7604 </sup> <n>to thee would they not leave</n> עֹלֵלֽוֹת׃ <sup>5955 </sup> <n>grapes</n>
6: אֵ֚יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>how</n> נֶחְפְּשׂ֣וּ <sup>2664 </sup> <n>searched out</n> עֵשָׂ֔ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>How are [the things] of Esau</n> נִבְע֖וּ <sup>1158 </sup> <n>things sought up</n> מַצְפֻּנָֽיו׃ <sup>4710 </sup> <n>[how] are his hidden</n>
7: עַֽד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>forth</n> הַגְּב֣וּל <sup>1366 </sup> <n>thee [even] to the border</n> שִׁלְּח֗וּךָ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>have brought</n> כֹּ֚ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>582 </sup> <n>All the men</n> בְרִיתֶ֔ךָ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>of thy confederacy</n> הִשִּׁיא֛וּךָ <sup>5377 </sup> <n>with thee have deceived</n> יָכְל֥וּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>thee [and] prevailed</n> לְךָ֖ אַנְשֵׁ֣י <sup>582 </sup> <n>the men</n> שְׁלֹמֶ֑ךָ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>that were at peace</n> לַחְמְךָ֗ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>against thee [they that eat] thy bread</n> יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>have laid</n> מָזוֹר֙ <sup>4204 </sup> <n>a wound</n> תַּחְתֶּ֔יךָ <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>else</n> תְּבוּנָ֖ה <sup>8394 </sup> <n>under thee [there is] none understanding</n> בּֽוֹ׃
8: הֲל֛וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> בַּיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Shall I not in that day</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> נְאֻם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֤י <sup>6 </sup> <n>even destroy</n> חֲכָמִים֙ <sup>2450 </sup> <n>the wise</n> מֵֽאֱד֔וֹם <sup>123 </sup> <n>[men] out of Edom</n> וּתְבוּנָ֖ה <sup>8394 </sup> <n>and understanding</n> מֵהַ֥ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>out of the mount</n> עֵשָֽׂו׃ <sup>6215 </sup> <n>Esau</n>
9: וְחַתּ֥וּ <sup>2865 </sup> <n>shall be dismayed</n> גִבּוֹרֶ֖יךָ <sup>1368 </sup> <n>And thy mighty</n> תֵּימָ֑ן <sup>8487 </sup> <n>[men] O Teman</n> לְמַ֧עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> יִכָּֽרֶת־ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>may be cut off</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the end that every one</n> מֵהַ֥ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of the mount</n> עֵשָׂ֖ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>of Esau</n> מִקָּֽטֶל׃ <sup>6993 </sup> <n>by slaughter</n>
10: מֵחֲמַ֛ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>For [thy] violence</n> אָחִ֥יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>against thy brother</n> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> תְּכַסְּךָ֣ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>shall cover</n> בוּשָׁ֑ה <sup>955 </sup> <n>shame</n> וְנִכְרַ֖תָּ <sup>3772 </sup> <n>thee and thou shalt be cut off</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
11: בְּיוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In the day</n> עֲמָֽדְךָ֣ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>that thou stoodest</n> מִנֶּ֔גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>On</n> בְּי֛וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>on the other side in the day</n> שְׁב֥וֹת <sup>7617 </sup> <n>carried away captive</n> זָרִ֖ים <sup>2114 </sup> <n>that the strangers</n> חֵיל֑וֹ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>his forces</n> וְנָכְרִ֞ים <sup>5237 </sup> <n>and foreigners</n> בָּ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>entered</n> [שַׁעֲרֹו כ] (שְׁעָרָ֗יו <sup>8179 </sup> <n>gate</n> ק) וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>for</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <sup>3389 </sup> <n>upon Jerusalem</n> יַדּ֣וּ <sup>3032 </sup> <n>and cast</n> גוֹרָ֔ל <sup>1486 </sup> <n>lots</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>again</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> כְּאַחַ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>even thou [wast] as one</n> מֵהֶֽם׃ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>do</n>
12: וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵּ֤רֶא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>But thou shouldest not have looked</n> בְיוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>on the day</n> אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>of thy brother</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> נָכְר֔וֹ <sup>5237 </sup> <n>alien</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּשְׂמַ֥ח <sup>8055 </sup> <n>neither shouldest thou have rejoiced</n> לִבְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>over the children</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> אָבְדָ֑ם <sup>6 </sup> <n>of their destruction</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> תַּגְדֵּ֥ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>proudly</n> פִּ֖יךָ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>neither shouldest thou have spoken</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> צָרָֽה׃ <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of distress</n>
13: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תָּב֤וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>Thou shouldest not have entered</n> בְשַֽׁעַר־ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>into the gate</n> עַמִּי֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> אֵידָ֔ם <sup>343 </sup> <n>of their calamity</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵּ֧רֶא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>yea thou shouldest not have looked</n> גַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Yes</n> אַתָּ֛ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> בְּרָעָת֖וֹ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>on their affliction</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> אֵיד֑וֹ <sup>343 </sup> <n>of their calamity</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּשְׁלַ֥חְנָה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>nor have laid</n> בְחֵיל֖וֹ <sup>2428 </sup> <n>[hands] on their substance</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> אֵידֽוֹ׃ <sup>343 </sup> <n>of their calamity</n>
14: וְאַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּעֲמֹד֙ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>Neither shouldest thou have stood</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> הַפֶּ֔רֶק <sup>6563 </sup> <n>in the crossway</n> לְהַכְרִ֖ית <sup>3772 </sup> <n>to cut off</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּלִיטָ֑יו <sup>6412 </sup> <n>those of his that did escape</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּסְגֵּ֥ר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>neither shouldest thou have delivered up</n> שְׂרִידָ֖יו <sup>8300 </sup> <n>those of his that did remain</n> בְּי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> צָרָֽה׃ <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of distress</n>
15: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> קָר֥וֹב <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[is] near</n> יוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>For the day</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>upon all the heathen</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>as thou hast done</n> יֵעָ֣שֶׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>it shall be done</n> לָּ֔ךְ גְּמֻלְךָ֖ <sup>1576 </sup> <n>unto thee thy reward</n> יָשׁ֥וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall return</n> בְּרֹאשֶֽׁךָ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon thine own head</n>
16: כִּ֗י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> שְׁתִיתֶם֙ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>For as ye have drunk</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mountain</n> קָדְשִׁ֔י <sup>6944 </sup> <n>upon my holy</n> יִשְׁתּ֥וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>drink</n> כָֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>[so] shall all the heathen</n> תָּמִ֑יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> וְשָׁת֣וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>yea they shall drink</n> וְלָע֔וּ <sup>3886 </sup> <n>and they shall swallow down</n> וְהָי֖וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>and become</n> כְּל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and they shall be as though they had not</n> הָיֽוּ׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>existed</n>
17: וּבְהַ֥ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>But upon mount</n> צִיּ֛וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> תִּהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will be those</n> פְלֵיטָ֖ה <sup>6413 </sup> <n>shall be deliverance</n> וְהָ֣יָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> קֹ֑דֶשׁ <sup>6944 </sup> <n>and there shall be holiness</n> וְיָֽרְשׁוּ֙ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall possess</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> מוֹרָֽשֵׁיהֶם׃ <sup>4180 </sup> <n>their possessions</n>
18: וְהָיָה֩ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Then</n> בֵית־ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>And the house</n> יַעֲקֹ֨ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> אֵ֜שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>shall be a fire</n> וּבֵ֧ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> יוֹסֵ֣ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph</n> לֶהָבָ֗ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>a flame</n> וּבֵ֤ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>and the house</n> עֵשָׂו֙ <sup>6215 </sup> <n>of Esau</n> לְקַ֔שׁ <sup>7179 </sup> <n>for stubble</n> וְדָלְק֥וּ <sup>1814 </sup> <n>and they shall kindle</n> בָהֶ֖ם וַאֲכָל֑וּם <sup>398 </sup> <n>in them and devour</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will be no</n> יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שָׂרִיד֙ <sup>8300 </sup> <n>them and there shall not be [any] remaining</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> עֵשָׂ֔ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>of Esau</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> דִּבֵּֽר׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>hath spoken</n>
19: וְיָרְשׁ֨וּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall possess</n> הַנֶּ֜גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>And [they of] the south</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mount</n> עֵשָׂ֗ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>of Esau</n> וְהַשְּׁפֵלָה֙ <sup>8219 </sup> <n>and [they of] the plain</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>the Philistines</n> וְיָרְשׁוּ֙ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>and they shall possess</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׂדֵ֣ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>the fields</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> וְאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> שְׂדֵ֣ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>and the fields</n> שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n> וּבִנְיָמִ֖ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>and Benjamin</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>[shall possess] Gilead</n>
20: וְגָלֻ֣ת <sup>1546 </sup> <n>And the captivity</n> הַֽחֵל־ <sup>2426 </sup> <n>of this host</n> הַ֠זֶּה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>of this</n> לִבְנֵ֨י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of the children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> כְּנַעֲנִים֙ <sup>3669 </sup> <n>[shall possess] that of the Canaanites</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>far</n> צָ֣רְפַ֔ת <sup>6886 </sup> <n>[even] unto Zarephath</n> וְגָלֻ֥ת <sup>1546 </sup> <n>and the captivity</n> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>of Jerusalem</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> בִּסְפָרַ֑ד <sup>5614 </sup> <n>which [is] in Sepharad</n> יִֽרְשׁ֕וּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>shall possess</n> אֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> עָרֵ֥י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the cities</n> הַנֶּֽגֶב׃ <sup>5045 </sup> <n>of the south</n>
21: וְעָל֤וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>shall come up</n> מֽוֹשִׁעִים֙ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>And saviours</n> בְּהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>on mount</n> צִיּ֔וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> לִשְׁפֹּ֖ט <sup>8199 </sup> <n>to judge</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mount</n> עֵשָׂ֑ו <sup>6215 </sup> <n>of Esau</n> וְהָיְתָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לַֽיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>shall be the LORD'S</n> הַמְּלוּכָֽה׃ <sup>4410 </sup> <n>and the kingdom</n>
